greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence combining A278222(n) and A294898(n).
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of ordered pair [A278222(n), A294898(n)].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A318311aux(n) = [A278222(n), A294898(n)]; \\ Needs also code from A286622.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 25 2018
